#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main()
{
	char userid[111][22], ch;
	int vote[111], visited[111];
	int T, N, i, j, ans, lastvote;

	for(scanf("%d",&T);T>0;T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);

		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			scanf("%s %c", userid[i], &ch);
			if(ch=='+') vote[i] = 1;
			else vote[i] = -1;
		}

		ans = 0;
		memset(visited, 0, sizeof(visited) );

		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			if(visited[i]) continue;

			for(j=i;j<N;j++)
				if(strcmp(userid[i],userid[j])==0)
				{
					lastvote = vote[j];
					visited[j] = 1;
				}
			
			ans += lastvote;
		}

		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}

	return 0;
}
